title: French typographic history
content:
i was hoping to learn something about french typography and it's history from some of you. famous typefaces, designers, and such. i'm not looking for anything incredibaly comprehensive, just an introduction. a launching point. thanks.

 [‹ What if god had a font? what would it be?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121092749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/438 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone driving to TypeCon? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121092749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/511 "Go to next forum topic")
author: timmy

comments.content: Well, for starters, you could look at the French perspective on the history of letters at JFP's [Typofonderie](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121092749/http:/www.typofonderie.com/Gazette/PTFHistoriqueTypoEngl.html) -- Digging around his site in general will lead you on a wonderful treasure hunt.
